Biography.ImageTooltip: This is a full body image you can set for this character. The dimensions should be 200x250 pixels, or 4:5 aspect ratio.
Biography.TooltipGM: There are GM notes assigned to this actor.

Container.AcceptedItemTypesTooltip: This section allows you to specify which item types are accepted by the container.
Container.AffectsEncumbranceTooltip: If disabled, contained items no longer affect character encumbrance.
Container.EquippedBulkMultiplierTooltip:
This multiplier is used for altering the bulk of the current item when it is equipped.
Setting this to 0 will make the current item not count its own bulk towards the actor's encumbrance when equipped.
Container.CapacityTooltip: How many 'slots' that can be utilized within this container.
Container.CapacityBulkTooltip: How much bulk can be contained within this container.
Container.StorageIdentifierTooltip: The kind of storage slot that is represented by this storage section.
Container.StorageTypeTooltip: This property defines if a storage section measures its contents in bulk or in slots.

Interface.DragToExternalTokenError: Cannot drag items to token actors not on the active scene.

Interface.ItemCollectionNoGMError: Failed to drop the items because there is no GM logged in.
Interface.ItemCollectionPickupNoGMError: Failed to pick up the item(s) because there is no GM logged in.
Interface.NoTarget: No target actor or token specified.

Interface.AmountToTransferMessage: Please enter the amount of items you want to transfer.

EncounterTracker.SelectNextType: Switch to the next combat type

Errors.HistoryLimitedResetInitiative:
The current phase has reset initiative, we cannot go back further in history.

Click to dismiss.
Errors.HistoryLimitedStartOfEncounter:
You have reached the start of the encounter, we cannot go back further in history.

Click to dismiss.
Errors.MissingInitiative:
The current phase has reset initiative, please re-roll initiative on all combatants before continueing.

Click to dismiss.

1.Name: Combat
1.Description: Everyone may now act out their combat turn.

1.Name: Changing Roles
1.Description: Anyone who wishes to change starship roles, may do so now.

2.Name: Engineering
2.Description: Captains, Engineers, Magic Officers, Chief Mates and Deck Hands may choose to act during this phase.

3.Name: Piloting Check
3.Description: Pilots may now roll their piloting checks to determine this round's initiative.

4.Name: Helm
4.Description: Captains, Pilots, Science Officers, Chief Mates and Deck Hands may choose to act during this phase.

5.Name: Gunnery
5.Description: Captains, and Gunners may choose to act during this phase.

6.Name: Damage
6.Description: Everyone now processes their received damages, critical thresholds, etc.

1.Name: Pilot Actions
1.Description: Drivers may now decide their maneuvers.

2.Name: Chase Progress
2.Description: The GM will now process the chase progress results.

3.Name: Combat
3.Description: Everyone may now act out their combat turn.

SFRPG.FlagsInstructions: Starfinderシステム上のキャラクター特性を設定する。
SFRPG.GreatFortitudeHint: 頑健セーヴィング･スロー +2

Attributes.BypassTooltip: (Optional) Some traps have a bypass mechanism that allows the trap’s creator or other users to temporarily disarm the trap.
Attributes.DurationTooltip: (Optional) If a trap has a duration longer than instantaneous, that is indicated here. Such a trap continues to produce its effect over multiple rounds on its initiative count.
Attributes.InitiativeTooltip: (Optional) Some traps roll initiative to determine when they activate in a combat round.
Attributes.ResetTooltip: This lists the amount of time it takes for a trap to reset itself automatically.
Attributes.TriggerTooltip: A trap’s trigger determines how it is set off. Unless otherwise noted, creatures smaller than Tiny do not normally set off traps.

DCs.DisableTooltip: This is the DC to disable the trap using the listed skill or skills.
DCs.NoticeTooltip: This is the DC to find the trap using Perception.

Effects.EffectTooltip: This lists the effect the trap has on those that trigger it.

Defenses.EACTooltip: If the mechanical parts of your trap can be attacked, this value helps determine how easy it is to hit.
Defenses.HardnessTooltip: Traps have a hardness based on their material.
Defenses.HitpointsTooltip: Crucial parts of some traps can be damaged and should have the listed number of Hit Points. Traps are immune to anything an object is immune to unless otherwise noted. A trap reduced to 0 HP is destroyed. Destroying a trap might set off a final component of the trap, like an explosion. Traps never have Stamina Points.
Defenses.KACTooltip: If the mechanical parts of your trap can be attacked, this value helps determine how easy it is to hit.

Offense.AttackTooltip: (Optional) The trap’s attack bonus is used if it directly attacks a target.
Offense.DamageTooltip: (Optional) The trap’s average damage is used if it directly attacks a target, but consider reducing this damage if a trap has multiple attacks or affects multiple targets.

Saves.FortitudeTooltip: If PCs use special attacks that can target objects against the trap, this value can be used for the trap’s Fortitude save.
Saves.ReflexTooltip: If PCs use special attacks that can target objects against the trap, this value can be used for the trap’s Reflex save.
Saves.WillTooltip: Traps don’t normally need Will saves, but if necessary, a trap’s Will save is a poor save.

Notifications.NoDamage: No value entered for damage, cannot make a roll for {name}.

SFRPG.ImprovedInitiativeLabel: イニシアチブ強化 (Improved Inititive)

Delete when Emptied
Should this container token automatically be removed when the last item is removed from it?

SFRPG.ItemNoUses: {name} は全弾､撃ち尽くしました！

Capacity.CapacityMaxTooltip: The max number of charges this item can hold
Capacity.HeaderTooltip: The number of rounds, charges, etc... that can be held by this item (eg, the number of charges a battery can hold)
Capacity.UsageTooltip: The amount of charges, peices of ammuntition, etc.. that are consummed when this item is used.
Capacity.UsageValueTooltip: The time unit used to determine when the item's capacitiy is consumed.

Equipment.ContainerTooltip: Armor typically can contain armor upgrades, or other items. Increase the storage capacity to allow adding content.

Containers.ContainerTooltip: Containers can contain just about any item. Increase the storage capacity to allow adding content.

Header.ArmorClassTooltip:
Armor Class
The armor class of this item, if left unattended. Otherwise, the attendee's armor class should be used instead.
An item is considered unattended if it is not currently under any influence of a character.
Header.HardnessTooltip:
Hardness
When taking damage, subtract the item's hardness from the incoming damage before applying.
Header.HitpointsTooltip:
Hitpoints
The amount of hitpoints available for this item.
An item is considered 'broken' if it has damage.
An item is considered 'destroyed' when its hitpoints are reduced to 0.
Header.ItemNameTooltip:
Item Name
The name given to this item.
Header.SaveTooltip:
Save DC
Formula: {formula}
This is the saving throw modifier for this item.
Header.SourceTooltip:
Source
Used primarily to denote what rules document this item came from

PhysicalProperties.ArmorClassTooltip:
Armor Class
The armor class of this item, if left unattended. Otherwise, the attendee's armor class should be used instead.
An item is considered unattended if it is not currently under any influence of a character.
PhysicalProperties.CustomBuiltTooltip: Was this item crafted by a character, or mass-produced?
PhysicalProperties.DexterityModifierTooltip: If inanimate, an item's dexterity modifier is -5.
PhysicalProperties.HardnessTooltip:
Hardness
When taking damage, subtract the item's hardness from the incoming damage before applying.

Hitpoints.CurrentTooltip: The amount of hitpoints this item has.
Hitpoints.HeaderTooltip:
Hitpoints
The amount of hitpoints available for this item.
An item is considered 'broken' if it has damage.
An item is considered 'destroyed' when its hitpoints are reduced to 0.
Hitpoints.MaxTooltip: The maximum amount of hitpoints this item can have. Leave blank for automatic calculation.

PhysicalProperties.SizeTooltip: By default, an item's size is medium. Item sizes affect the item armor class, alter as needed.
PhysicalProperties.SturdyTooltip: Equipment, such as weapons and armors, are considered sturdy.

StarshipAblativeArmor.AblativeValueTooltip: The total amount of ablative armor hitpoints to distribute over the four quadrants.
StarshipAblativeArmor.TargetLockPenaltyTooltip: The penalty applied to the ship's target lock score.
StarshipAblativeArmor.TurnDistancePenaltyTooltip: The penalty applied to the ship's turn distance score.

StarshipArmor.ArmorBonusTooltip: The armor class bonus provided by this armor.
StarshipArmor.TargetLockPenaltyTooltip: The penalty applied to the ship's target lock score.
StarshipArmor.TurnDistancePenaltyTooltip: The penalty applied to the ship's turn distance score.

StarshipComponent.CostTooltip: The amount of buildpoints required to obtain this component.
StarshipComponent.CostMultipliedBySizeTooltip: Is the BP cost multiplied by the starship frame size?
StarshipComponent.PCUTooltip: The amount of power this component requires to function.

StarshipComputer.ModifierTooltip: The roll modifier provided by this computer.
StarshipComputer.NodesTooltip: The amount of times per turn this computer can provide its bonus for.

StarshipDefensiveCountermeasure.TargetLockBonusTooltip: The bonus applied to the ship's target lock score.

StarshipDriftEngine.EngineRatingTooltip: The Engine Rating for this drift engine.
StarshipDriftEngine.MaxSizeTooltip: The maximum ship size this engine can be installed onto.

StarshipFortifiedHull.CriticalThresholdBonusTooltip: The bonus applied to the ship's critical threshold score.

Details.CostTooltip: The amount of buildpoints required to obtain this frame.
Details.CrewMinimumTooltip: The minimum number of crew members required to operate a starship based on this frame.
Details.CrewMaximumTooltip: The maximum number of crew members able to take up a role on a starship based on this frame.
Details.DamageThresholdTooltip: If a starship has a Damage Threshold, any attack that would deal damage to its Hull Points equal to or less than this Damage Threshold fails to damage the ship’s Hull Points. If the damage is greater than the Damage Threshold, the full amount of damage is dealt to the ship’s Hull Points.
Details.ExpansionBaysTooltip: The number of expansion bays available for this frame.
Details.HitpointsTooltip: The amount of Hull Points this frame has at tier 1.
Details.HitpointsIncrementTooltip: The number of Hull Points a starship with that frame automatically gains when its tier increases to 4 (and every 4 tiers thereafter; see page 294).
Details.ManeuverabilityTooltip:
Starship maneuverability affects piloting and turning abilities.
Clumsy: -2 Piloting, Turn 4
Poor: -1 Piloting, Turn 3
Average: +0 Piloting, Turn 2
Good: +1 Piloting, Turn 1
Perfect: +2 Piloting, Turn 0
Details.SizeTooltip: The size of the frame dictates the size of the starship.
Details.WeaponArcTooltip: The amount of weapon mounts available for the ship arc, split into light, heavy, and capital mounts.

StarshipPowerCore.ProvidedPowerTooltip: The amount of PCU provided by this power core.
StarshipPowerCore.SizesTooltip: Select the starship sizes that this power core can be installed onto.

StarshipReinforcedBulkhead.FortificationTooltip: Whenever the starship would sustain critical damage, there is a percent chance based on the reinforced bulkhead’s fortification rating that the critical damage effect is negated (though the attack still deals damage to the starship).

StarshipSensor.ModifierTooltip: An additional modifier when scanning planets outside of combat.
StarshipSensor.RangeTooltip: Range increment of the scanner, short is 5, medium is 10, and long is 15 hexes.

StarshipShield.ArmorBonusTooltip: The armor class bonus provided by this shield.
StarshipShield.DefenseValueTooltip: The maximum defense value available with this deflector shield.
StarshipShield.RegenerationTooltip: The amount of shield points regenerated per minute.
StarshipShield.ShieldPointsTooltip: The total amount of shield points provided by this shield.
StarshipShield.ShieldTypeTooltip: Is this shield a deflector shield?
StarshipShield.TargetLockBonusTooltip: The bonus applied to the ship's target lock score.

StarshipThruster.BoosterTooltip: For more information, see the Booster Thruster Housing expansion bay.
StarshipThruster.PilotingModifierTooltip: Additional piloting modifier gained from this thruster.
StarshipThruster.SizeTooltip: Select the starship size that this thruster can be installed onto.
StarshipThruster.SpeedTooltip: Number of hexes the starship will be able to move per turn using this thruster.

Weapons.ContainerTooltip: Weapons typically can contain weapon fusions and weapon upgrades. Increase the storage capacity to allow adding upgrades and fusions.

SFRPG.LightningReflexesHint: 反応セーヴィング･スロー +2
SFRPG.MigrationBeginingMigration: Starfinderシステムの移行をバージョン{systemVersion}に適用しようとしています。しばらくお待ちください。ゲームを閉じたり、サーバーをシャットダウンしたりしないでください。
SFRPG.MigrationEndMigration: Starfinderシステム、バージョン{systemVersion}への移行が成功しました！
SFRPG.MigrationErrorMessage: Starfinderのデータ移行中にエラーが発生しました。バックアップは作成しましたよね？
SFRPG.MigrationSuccessfulMessage: Starfinderのデータが現在のバージョンに正常に移行されました。
SFRPG.ModifierEffectTypeTooltip: 修正値の影響を受ける一般的な特性を識別します
SFRPG.ModifierEnabledTooltip: 特性修正値が計算されるときに修正値が考慮されるかどうかを決定します
SFRPG.ModifierModifierTypeTooltip: 修正値は定数（+2）またはロール式（+1d4）にすることができます。これは修正値フィールドをどちらか一方に識別するために使用されます
SFRPG.ModifierNotesTooltip: 特定の修正値に関するメモ
SFRPG.ModifierSourceTooltip: この修正値はどこからのものですか？ アイテム？ 呪文？ 別のキャラクター？
SFRPG.ModifierTypeTooltip: 修正値のタイプ。複数の修正値が同じタイプ(通常は最大)の場合、使用する修正値を判別するために使用されます
SFRPG.ModifierValueAffectedLabel: 影響を受ける特定の値
SFRPG.ModifierValueAffectedTooltip: 一般特性に多くに可能な値がある場合、影響を受ける特定の値を識別します

SFRPG.RepairDroneChatMessage: {name} は {regainedHP} HPまで修理されました。
SFRPG.RepairDroneDialogDescription: ドローンを修理しますか？　通常、１０分につきドローンの持つ最大HPの１０％まで修理します。ドローン修理(Ex)特技がある場合、最大HPの25％まで修理できます。
SFRPG.RepairDroneDialogImprovedFeat: ドローン修理(Ex)特技のルールを使用する
SFRPG.RepairDroneUnnecessary: {name} は､すでに最大HPに達しているため修理の必要はありません。
SFRPG.RestSChatMessage: {name} は１０分の小休憩を取ります。
SFRPG.RestSChatMessageRestored: {name} は１０分の小休憩をとり、{spentRP} RPを費やして {regainedSP} SPを回復しました。
SFRPG.RestSDescription: 小休憩しますか？ 小休憩時に１点のRPを費やして、全てのSPが回復できます。

Character.HarryingFireTooltip: Enable this bonus when attacking a target affected by Harrying Fire.

Dialog.AvailableModifiersTooltip: List of the available modifiers for this roll.
Dialog.FormulaTooltip: The formula used to calculate the roll.
Dialog.RollModeTooltip: Roll Mode determines who can see this roll.
Dialog.SelectorTooltip: Dynamic actor selection for the '{name}' formula context.
Dialog.SituationalBonusTooltip: Are there any additional bonuses that apply to this roll? (For example, range increments)

AutoCollapseCard.Hint: チャットログのアイテムカードの説明を自動的に折りたたみます。

CombatCards.VehicleChaseHint: Change which combat chat cards should be displayed during vehicle chases.

UseCustomChatCard.Name: カスタムされたStarfinderチャットカードを使用しますか？

UseQuickRollAsDefault.Hint: When clicking abilities that roll dice, the roll will act as if the Shift key was depressed by default. This will trigger a fast-forwarded roll.

SpellBook.NoSpells: このフィルタ･セットには呪文が見つかりませんでした。

Tooltips.PushTooltip: Push actions (indicated in an action’s heading) are difficult to perform but can yield greater results. You can’t perform a push action if the necessary system is malfunctioning or wrecked (as noted in Critical Damage Conditions on page 321).

Attributes.ComplementMin: Minimum crew needed to run the ship.
Attributes.ComplementMax: Maximum number of crew that can be assigned to a role on the ship (not the maximum number of creatures that can be aboard).

Crew.CrewLimitReached: You have reached the maximum amount of crew allowed for the role of '{targetRole}'.

Critical.EditMessage: Select which roles are affected by damage to this system.

Damage.Message: Damage to a starship always originates from a specific direction, please select the quadrant the incoming damage should be applied to.
Damage.Title: {name} - Select the damaged quadrant.

Details.AblativeExceedsHull: Total ablative exceeds double hull points!
Details.AblativeExceedsHullTooltip: A starship cannot support ablative armor if its temporary Hull Points exceed twice its standard Hull Point total. (For more information, see the Starship Operations Manual pg. 20)
Details.AblativeTooHighTooltip: Either the total of installed ablative is too high, or the sum total of current ablative score is too high.
Details.ShieldHighestTooHigh: One or more quadrants exceed limits!
Details.ShieldHighestTooHighTooltip: A shield quadrant cannot exceed 70% of the total shield allocation, as the minimum available for each shield must be 10%. (For more information, see the Core Rulebook pg. 302)
Details.ShieldTotalTooHighTooltip: The total sum of shields exceeds the shield's maximum output.

Header.HullPointIncrementTooltip: This is the number of hull points that are added when the ship reaches tier 4 (and every 4 tiers after)

Weapons.NoCapacity: This weapon does not have any charges left to attack.

Save DC
This is the saving throw modifier for this attack.

Movement.FullTooltip: Movement in tactical combat when using full action.
Movement.Title: Speed

Header.PriceTooltip: The amount of credits this is vehicle worth.
